OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord stage disease ( O-II v III-IV ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive fludarabine IV 30 minute day 1-5 . - Arm II : Patients receive fludarabine arm I plus cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year every 6 month disease progression .
